attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 6Music may be axed due to a BBC Trust aim to save money at the BBC, however this is seen as a way to promote itself in the media, so instead of giving their stars (who are on outrageous amounts of money) pay-cuts they plan to cut a station that reaches over 600,000 people a week and costs Jonathan Ross's yearly pay package to run, so please sign to save 6Music

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government and so this is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
